property.name: Low-Power Address Bus Coding Scheme (XOR + M-Bit Bus Invert)
text
property.value: Platform model, do not change anything inside the rectangle.

property.name: text
property.value: CPU model, right-click and look inside.

property.name: text
property.value: Multiprocessor CPU model, do not change.

property.name: text
property.value:
Each PE keeps issuing arbitration requests to the respective output port at every clock cycle until a GRANT token is received from the bus on the input port.
Upon GRANT token reception, PE closes the transaction and carries on in case of a WRITE, or keeps waiting for a DATA token on the input port in case of a READ.
Upon READ token reception, close the transaction and carry on.
